summary: This is a Retexture of the great Fiora Armour from Shadowtroop
descriptionHtml:
This is a Retexture of the great Fiora Armour from Shadowtroop
-------------------------
Thank you Shadowtroop for your permission to retexture this great Armour
--------------------------
I was not an easy job
it was cost many hours and many days of my live
i create exactly 10 retexture versions of this armour till i get this result.
So if you like this MOD please endorse.
---------------------------
For more infomations were to get this Armour watch the original mod at

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13983&navtag=file/images.php?id=13983&tab=3


_________________
INSTALATION

If you whant to use this retexture mod and already have the original mod 
you have to uninstall it first und then install this mod.
If you dont do this you may have Problems like texture mishmash ect.

It´s better but not necessary if you use the MODMANAGER

It´s a stand alone Mod you dont need the original file to install it

It works with every Bodymod

enjoy it


Credits
======================

Thanks to:
Bethesda
Shadowtroop
NEXUS


__________________________

UPDATE 1.2
Chainmailsuit is now more 3D with better light reflektion
I also change the letherstraps color in to more dark brown

For the rest of changes coming from mod creator Shadowtroop please read in the original file the update log at:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13983&navtag=file/images.php?id=13983&tab=3

___________________________________

Update 1.3
2 new color version has been added
Blachain and 
Black-Gold-Chain 

see pictures
author: Ilias
